nodes.text: "Scorched" is a short story by Delilah S. Dawson, with art by Joe Corroney, that was released on May 3, 2016 as part of Star Wars Insider 165. The story is a tie-in to the novel Bloodline, written by Claudia Gray. It features the character Greer Sonnel, an ally of Senator Leia Organa, who is featured in Bloodline. "Scorched" takes place before the events of Bloodline, providing background information on Sonnel's character.
